title: Sales Development Representative - French Speaking, Inbound
content:
At Qualtrics, we create software the world’s best brands use to deliver exceptional frontline experiences, build high-performing teams, and design products people love. But we are more than a platform— We are the creators and stewards of the Experience Management category serving over 18K clients globally. Building a category takes grit, determination, and a disdain for convention—but most of all it requires close-knit, high-functioning teams with an unwavering dedication to serving our customers.
 
When you join one of our teams, you’ll be part of a nimble group that’s empowered to set aggressive goals and move fast to achieve them. Strategic risks are encouraged and complex problems are solved together, by passing the mic and iterating until the best solution comes to light. You won’t have to look to find growth opportunities—ready or not, they’ll find you. From retail to government to healthcare, we’re on a mission to bring humanity, connection, and empathy back to business. Join over 6,000 people across the globe who think that’s work worth doing.
Sales Development Program
Dublin 
Our unique Sales Development Program is developed and designed to create a structured career path for our Sales Development Representatives to transition into Key Account Executives & experts within the Experience Management category. 
The program consists of three levels;
Level 1 - Inbound Sales Development Representative
Level 2 - New Business Development Representative
Level 3 - Emerging Sales Representative 
 
A Day In The Life (Level 1: Inbound Sales Development Representative)

As an Inbound Sales Development Representative, your goal is to help our customers gain insights on their customers, employees, products and brand, which allow them to make data-driven decisions with direct positive business impact;
The role of an SDR is extremely vital to Qualtrics’ success - you are the first point of contact of our clients where you are responsible for identifying their pain points, understanding their gaps and connecting them with our experts (Account Executives);
The SDRs have the opportunity to deal with individual/business owners in varying industries across Europe

A Day in The Life (Level 2: Sales Development Representative)

Proactively generate new business through researching, qualifying, cold calling and networking with exposure to speaking with C-Level leaders across varying industries;
Establishing creative approach when reaching out to prospects - from sending personalised messages to tailoring conversations specific to the clients’ needs;
Collaborate with Account Executives & Marketing to strategise methods for success specific to the region/s - from market research to actively connect and introduce Qualtrics solutions to prospects

A Day in The Life (Level 3: Emerging Sales Representative (ESR)) 

The ESR does a similar role to an Outbound Sales Development Representative whilst also carrying a revenue target
In the role of an ESR, you will manage, qualify and present the Qualtrics value and solutions to customers
You will work closely with Account Executives and shadow the entire deal cycle to be enabled to close smaller deals yourself

What We Are Looking For

You thrive in a space where creativity and innovation are part of everyday life;
You like to strategise and plan out creative methods to generate more business opportunities;
You are passionate about your personal growth and career development;
Opportunity for promotion and recognition motivate you;
A minimum of 6 months relevant Sales experience is required
A Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent is required;
Fluent in French & English required. Fluent in French, English & another European language an advantage.

We are passionate about our Global Initiatives
Qualtrics launched 5 For The Fight that partners with leading cancer research centers across the world to fund some of the most groundbreaking cancer research being done today.
We have some great initiatives from our very own Clubs & Societies - from WLD (Women Leadership Development) that creates a diverse community, to Green Team that is passionate about helping to improve the environment.
What Differentiates Us From Others (Benefits & Life at the office when we return)

On top of our benefits (Healthcare, Pension, Bike to work, Travel tax, Wellness bonus etc.), we are offering an exciting ‘Experience Bonus’ after a year of service. The purpose is to fund a dream you’ve always dreamt of! it could be from attending a sporting event or concert or visiting somewhere exotic or staying at a 5 star hotel! 
Day to day perks include free lunch, snacks and drinks

 
Qualtrics is an equal opportunity employer meaning that all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, status as a protected veteran, or any other protected characteristic. ​​​​​​​Applicants in the United States of America have rights under Federal Employment Laws: Family & Medical Leave Act, Equal Opportunity Employment, Employee Polygraph Protection ActQualtrics is committed to the inclusion of all qualified individuals. As part of this commitment, Qualtrics will ensure that persons with disabilities are provided with reasonable accommodations. If reasonable accommodation is needed to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and/or to receive other benefits and privileges of employment, please let your Qualtrics contact/recruiter know.
 
Qualtrics Work Experience - As we look to the future, we believe that our teams are better together. Being together will help us learn more, grow faster and ultimately deliver better results for our customers and Qualtrics. Roles tied to an office location work 4 days per week in the office together and 1 day from home, with a strong spirit of flexibility around taking time for personal, health, and family moments in our work weeks. Our managers work with their teams to create a collaborative, engaged work environment, and arrangement that works for each of our team members.
 
Not finding a role that’s the right fit for now? Qualtrics Insiders is the one-stop shop for all things Qualtrics Life. Sign up for exclusive access to content created with you in mind and get the scoop on what we have going on at Qualtrics - upcoming events, behind the scenes stories from the team, interview tips, hot jobs, and more. No spam - we promise! You'll hear from us two times a month max with fresh, totally tailored info - so be sure to stay connected as you explore your best role and company fit.

demographic_questions.description:
DEI (Diversity, Equity and Inclusion) is a cornerstone of our company culture. With strong views on diversity and inclusion, immigration, wage equality, and the universality of human rights—without regard to race, color, creed, gender, or sexual orientation— we will not be quiet but will amplify these views on behalf of our employees and organization. We are taking action to improve DEI through our people, processes, and technology.

With this in mind, we invite you to participate in the following set of voluntary demographic questions. The data collected will be used anonymously and in aggregate, so we can evaluate our processes to ensure we're providing equal opportunities to applicants from all backgrounds. Your responses, or your choice not to respond, will not be associated with your specific application and will not in any way be used for individual hiring or compensation decisions.

The following question  is optional. If you would prefer not to answer, you can skip to the next set of questions, or select "Prefer not to say". Any personal data collected using this survey, including any special categories of personal data, shall be processed in accordance with the Qualtrics Candidate Privacy Statement, available at https://www.qualtrics.com/candidate-privacy-statement/.

questions.description: In order to better understand your timeline and situation, we are interested to understand what other options you are considering including:  specific companies, positions, locations, and how far along you are in the process with each.
